items.name: use-boolean
items.description: A custom hook to manage boolean state.

items.name: use-click-outside
items.description: A custom hook to detect clicks outside a specified element.

items.name: use-copy-to-clipboard
items.description: A custom hook to copy text to the clipboard.

items.name: use-debounce-fun
items.description: A custom hook that debounces a function.

items.name: use-debounce-value
items.description: A custom hook that debounces a value.

items.name: use-event-listener
items.description: A custom hook to add and remove event listeners.

items.name: use-interval
items.description: A custom hook to manage intervals.

items.name: use-is-mobile
items.description: A custom hook to detect mobile devices.

items.name: use-isomorphic-layout-effect
items.description: A custom hook that works like useLayoutEffect but is compatible with server-side rendering.

items.name: use-local-storage
items.description: A custom hook to manage local storage state.

items.name: use-timeout
items.description: A custom hook to manage timeouts.

items.name: capitalize
items.description: A utility function to capitalize the first letter of a string.

items.name: is-empty
items.description: A utility function to check if a value is empty (null, undefined, empty string, array, or object).

items.name: is-valid-url
items.description: A utility function to check if a string is a valid URL.

items.name: slugify
items.description: A utility function to convert a string into a URL-friendly slug.

items.name: truncate-text
items.description: A utility function to truncate text to a maximum length with ellipsis.
